      :snt1 (n / notice-01

            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (c / change-01

                  :ARG1 (a / altitude)
                  :ARG2 (h / high-02

      :snt2 (d / doom-01
            :ARG0 (e / err-01
                  :ARG0 (a2 / altitude))
            :ARG1 (f / fly-01
